updates.text: [NSL]CLEARED: Normal train service resumed. Trains are travelling at a slower speed over the affected track.
[NSL]UPDATE:Due to a rail crack at #YioChuKang, estimate 15mins additional traveling time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio towards #MarinaBay.
[NSL]UPDATE:Due to a rail crack at #YioChuKang, estimate 15mins additional traveling time from #Woodlands to #DhobyGhaut towards #MarinaBay.
[NSL]UPDATE: Due to a track fault at #YioChuKang, as a safety precaution trains are travelling slower from #Woodlands to #DhobyGhaut.
[NSL]UPDATE:Due to a rail crack at #YioChuKang, estimate 30mins additional traveling time from #Woodlands to #DhobyGhaut towards #MarinaBay.
[NSL]UPDATE:SMRT engineers are at affected track checking the cause.Trains travelling slower over the affected track as a safety precaution
[NSL] Due to a rail crack at #YioChuKang, estimate 30mins additional traveling time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio towards #MarinaBay.
[NSL]: Estimate 30 mins additional travelling time from #Woodlands to #AngMoKio towards MarinaBay due to track fault at Yio Chu Kang.
